attributes.action: Cars Road Tax Should Be Extended Automatically for 6 month
attributes.additional_details:
Due to Covid-19 crisis all Uk nationals and residents are suffering in all forms, Uk government should give some immediate relief on expenses and should extend automatically 6 months road tax to all domestic vehicles. 
GOD bless us all.
attributes.background: All Vehicles road tax should be abandoned for 6 months at least due to people earnings crisis.
